message:
any one here worked on asp.net Signalr ?????
i want to make sub domains  with it

data.message:
Did you check these?
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9888294/signalr-connection-using-subdomains
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9984534/signalr-cross-domain-connections-cors-access-control-allow-origin-issues
Sorry if you did, a mandatory "did you google it first"  check.
yes but cant work for me
are you work on signalr before??
Well, let's say I know a few things about it. Stating a problem will help you more than just asking if people used it.

yes, the maximum concurrent connection  in the browser is 6
that mean when user try to open 7 tab in my web in the browser the server cant respond

This has nothing to do with subdomains, unless you are talking about using subdomains to solve it.
See this exact comment: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9984534/signalr-cross-domain-connections-cors-access-control-allow-origin-issues#comment33188242_9984798

Your problem and solution are also discussed here:
http://stackoverflow.com/a/13037378

i have checked all this links and not work for me
and most of solution advice to use subdomains to solve this problem  and i dont know how to make subdomain in the same app
Do you do your mapping as part of the OWIN startup as in the SO comment (not the answer itself), did it have the subdomains property?

> i dont know how to make subdomain in the same app

then you should learn how to configure multiple domains to be served by the same app!
